hudson.model.BooleanParameterDefinition.name: full
hudson.model.BooleanParameterDefinition.description:
Boolean value: True - Full rebuild of Bare Metal Environment servers cleaned and brought up from PXE boot (adds ~30 minutes) False - Destroy only deployed containers and deploy information (ansible facts, deployed parameters)
You probably want this to be selected

hudson.model.BooleanParameterDefinition.name: redeploy
hudson.model.BooleanParameterDefinition.description:
Boolean value: True - Redeploy OpenStack on environment False - Do not redeploy OpenStack on rebuild environment
You probably want this to be selected
